plot: Prince Lightstar leads the Legion of Light against Baron Dark, once a man, now an evil skeleton lord, and his army of skeletons. Dark's goal is to capture the Crystal that powers the world and Lightstar must stop him.
plot_en: Prince Lightstar leads the Legion of Light against Baron Dark, once a man, now an evil skeleton lord, and his army of skeletons. Dark's goal is to capture the Crystal that powers the world and Lightstar must stop him.
plot_es: Prince Lightstar leads the Legion of Light against Baron Dark, once a man, now an evil skeleton lord, and his army of skeletons. Dark's goal is to capture the Crystal that powers the world and Lightstar must stop him.
title: Skeleton Warriors
